data.title: Republic of Türkiye Ministry of Foreign Affairs
data.text:
Minister of Foreign Affairs Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu accompanied Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoğlu on an official visit on the occasion of the First Intergovernmental Summit meeting between Turkey and Portugal to Lisbon on 3 March 2015.

In addition to Foreign Minister Çavuşoğlu, Deputy Prime Ministers Ali Babacan, Minister for EU Affairs and Chief Negotiator Volkan Bozkır, Minister of National Education Nabi Avcı, Minister of Finance Mehmet Şimşek, Minister of National Defence İsmet Yılmaz also accompanied Prime Minister Davutoğlu.
